type MyInt int

func (n *MyInt) Add(m int) {

func main() {
    m := MyInt(17)
    r := strings.NewReader("hello, go")
    s := S{
        MyInt: &m,
        t: t{
            a: 1,
            b: 2,
        },
        Reader: r,
        s:      "demo",
    }

    var sl = make([]byte, len("hello, go"))
    s.Reader.Read(sl)
    fmt.Println(string(sl)) // hello, go
    s.MyInt.Add(5)
    fmt.Println(*(s.MyInt)) // 22
}
